website_summaries.verdict: A build-it-yourself battle drone kit adds to the challenge and fun of the sport.
pros: Great for STEM clubs and kids who want a kit-build drone set
Extra battery allows action to continue while recharging the first
Drones can be controlled with 2.4 GHz controller or a smartphone app
cons: Drones can be tricky to build, and instructions need improvement

customer_reviews.title: Good, fun, easy.
customer_reviews.text: Good little intro to drone tinkering. Don't get this and think you're going to be an expert by any means, but this is a fantastic little starter if, like me, you know nothing going into it. It works, and its fun. I upgraded mine to a 1200 mah battery and it flies just fine with even more flight time. Had to cut the battery clip off to get it to fit though cause it was pretty big. Anyway, definitely a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Individual

customer_reviews.title: Please arrange for a refund on my second try on this order.
customer_reviews.text: I received the first one, tried many times to get it to operate. So I received the replacement, tried and tried to make it work. Days later still unable to get the things working, I followed the instructions to the letter. Please send call tag so I may send the replacement back for a refund. I am just going to have to spend a few $'s more.. great price, and advertised correctly. Just don't think this is the best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The drone is everything my son wanted! The seller is EXCELLENT and thorough in responding and trying to correct where we had a problem. The drone wasn't flying right at first and we contacted for guidance. Not only did he show us detailed instructions, he also offered to ship another one. Thank you so much! Will do business again!
customer_reviews.author: LrT

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after my son experienced putting one together in class. It was a birthday present. In class, they had to assemble the kit. The one we purchased came semi assembled so I have no idea who owned it before....seemed odd. It was not even 30 days when the drone stopped working. Issue has not been resolved after contacting them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne P.

customer_reviews.title: fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys, you have to pay close attention to how to put it together. I wrote a bad review on the company and I take that back, it was my fault I missed their email, they are quick to respond. The drone is fun to fly and durable, just have to watch the blades, they will be the first thing to come off, when you crash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Easy to use and assemble. Comes with detailed instructions, and everything you need right out of the box. Even batteries for he remote! Comes with 2 batteries for the drone as well both charged! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required/ buy at ur own risk
customer_reviews.text: I never got it to work. I guess that's not the sellers fault but if I would have known I had to put it together myself I never would have paid $50! Read before u buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shapree Mallory

customer_reviews.title: This is a Pcln of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson as Christmas present. He is 14 years old and very smart with any electronic or mechanical assembly, but this Diy thing didn't even pass a little touch and the wire broke right at a little touch. Since I ordered it in October I am out of luck to get refund!
customer_reviews.author: Lee T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little kit even after I abused the drone everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little kit even after I abused the drone everything is holding up! easy to assemble with to the point instructions. I cant believe how high the little sucker will fly w/ such control............If your thinking about getting into drones BUY THIS KIT !!! Thanks "Go On 123" made my night !
customer_reviews.author: John-Luke Laderach

customer_reviews.title: Drone
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my nephew. He loved it!! I thought it was cool but a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Fun drone with mediocre instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instruction manual has helpful pictures, but the text is very confusing. This made assembly and operation more difficult. But once we figured it out through trial and error, it's a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Great drone.
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is excellent. Easy to fly. Easy to build. Balanced. Connects to Wi-Fi. Very impressed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S Padgett

customer_reviews.title: A good starter one for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's everything you want from a drone. A good starter one for the price, easy to fly easy to control, easy to assemble for your first flight.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present for a 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to our Grandson for his 12th birthday. He put it together with no problem. He caught on very fast on flying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Pierce

product_meta.title: DIY Mini RC Toy Quadcopter Battle Drone Set Building Kit With FPV HD Camera RTF Helicopter For Kids with Extra Battery and Battery for Remote Controller
product_meta.description:
Product Descriptions:

 * Drone Size: 13.5 x 13.5 x 5 cm / 4 x 4 x 1.97 inches. 
 * Built-in Drone Battery: 3.7V 350mAh Li-Po battery. 
 * Flight Time: About 5 minutes. 
 * Charging Time: Approx. 50 minutes. 
 * Control distance: 30-50 meters. 
 * Battery for controller: 3 "AAA" batteries required (included)
 * Camera Pixel: 480P Camera, 0.3MP
 * Charing Way: USB Charger

Functions:

 * 6-Axis gyro system: The inner gyro system helps to keep the drone balanced and steady and making it better to aerial photograph
 * 360° ROLL-OVER: The simple flying of WSAD is to boring, and the new 3D rolling makes it possible for excellent performance of flips and rolls by simple push of the button. 
 * Altitude Hold Mode: Drone will altitude specified a flight mode. Beginners easy to manipulate. More Stable in flight. 
 * Headless Mode: Fly the quadcopter just ignore the direction. Once the fuselage direction can not be recognized, it can enter headless mode so as to continue the flight. 
 * One Key Take Off: The drone will hover at certain altitude automaticallyafter taking off. 
 * One Key Landing: The drone will fly down slowly and land on the ground automatically before the motors stopping. 
 * WIFI REAL TIME TRANSIMISSION: Built in 480P HD Camera,taking videos and photos, it stores to the mobile phone direclty. 
 * APP control: The Drones can be controlled by phone(IOS & Android)and remote controller, two ways to control.

Packge contents:

 * 1x main body
 * 1x main PCB
 * 1x camera(480P) 
 * 4x motors
 * 8x propellers
 * 1x remote controller
 * 1x phone holder
 * 1x USB adapter
 * 1x Manual
 * 2x batteries for drones
 * 3x AAA battery for remote control
 * 1x Propeller puller tool 
 * 1x Screw Driver
 * 4x protective shell
feature_bullets: BATTLE MODE: If buy 2 drones together Being shot at first time,the drone hovers around a circle and the light goes blinking.Being shot at the second time,the drone hovers around two circles and the light goes blinking.Being shot at the third time,the drone hovers around three circles and the light goes blinking.After being shot the fourth time,the drone slowly lands to the ground,then the motors stop and the light glow solid.the drone can fly again by restating.

DIY KIT: Our 2.4G 4CH 6-Axis Gyro Assembly RC Quadcopter Drone will come with our the parts you need to build your own functioning RC Drones in approximately 30 minutes (soldering is required to put pieces together).

WIFI HD CAMERA: Build in 480P Camera, 2.4GHz WIFI real-time FPV - IPHONE and ANDROID. Pictures and videos are stored on smart phone's memory. Easy to review and share.The aircraft can be controlled with the transmitter or a smart phone App.Search Keyword "Racing FPV" in the APP Store or Google play to download the APP, or Scan the QR Code in the user manual directly to download the APP.
GREAT FOR STEM TEACHING CURRICULUM: Our DIY drone kit helps teach and encourage kids to to develop skills in the core disciplines of science, technology, engineering, and math.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Headless Mode, Altitude hold mode, APP Mobile Phone Control (IOS & Android), One key to take-off and landing, Hover Height, 480P HD Camera Take videos and Photos, up and down, forward and backward, side-flying, left and right turning, Two Flight Control Modes, LED Light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars24 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
